content: You have entered a circular map. In the following questions, I will tell you what items are on the map, as well as your position and movements. You need to tell me the item you find after your movements. Please provide only the name of the item. Note that your answer should include only the name of the item and no other words.

You have been given a circular path consisting of 10 connected dots. At the start, you are positioned on the dot that is located at the top of the path, where you find an ear. Moving in a clockwise direction from the ear, the elements on the path are a mongoose, a bagel, a Border Collie, a screw, a paintbrush, a Labrador Retriever, a waffle iron, a jeep, and an ice pop. Starting from the paintbrush, you move around the ring by 2 steps in a clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 7 steps in a counter-clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 5 steps in a counter-clockwise direction. What will you find?

Starting from the paintbrush, you move around the ring by 2 steps in a clockwise direction. This brings you to the screw. Then, you move around the ring by 7 steps in a counter-clockwise direction. This takes you back to the paintbrush. Finally, you move around the ring by 5 steps in a counter-clockwise direction. This brings you to the Labrador Retriever. Therefore, what you will find is a Labrador Retriever.

Moving in a clockwise direction from the ear, the elements on the path are a mongoose, a bagel, a Border Collie, a screw, a paintbrush, a Labrador Retriever, a waffle iron, a jeep, and an ice pop. Starting from the paintbrush, you move around the ring by 4 steps in a clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 14 steps in a counter-clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 10 steps in a counter-clockwise direction. What will you find?

Starting from the paintbrush, you move around the ring by 4 steps in a clockwise direction. This brings you to the screw. Then, you move around the ring by 14 steps in a counter-clockwise direction. This takes you back to the paintbrush. Finally, you move around the ring by 10 steps in a counter-clockwise direction. This brings you to the waffle iron. Therefore, what you will find is a waffle iron.
